note: Countries are only included in the WHO Mortality Database if over 65% of deaths have a registered cause. There is an 18-24 month lag before countries report finalized data; it should not be inferred from this chart that reporting for the most recent years has decreased.
title: Countries adopting the International Classification of Diseases guidelines
subtitle: The number of countries that have reported to the WHO Mortality Database using a given version of the [International Classification of Diseases (ICD)](#dod:icd) to classify causes of death.
